description: Tommy Deluca is a private sort of guy. He doesn't like people messing with his stuff. It makes him feel violated, and not in a good way. So when he comes home to find Jamie Aero poking around in his stuff, he is not at all amused. Luckily for Jamie, the only thing stronger than Tommy's paranoia is his libido, so assuming Jamie can poke around in Tommy's stuff for just a little while longer, chances are pretty good that Tommy will let him go scott free and cum covered.Enjoy!
title: CAUGHT IN THE ACT
